mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Robertson, Isaac D.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Waupakoneta, Oglaze Co., Ohio [Wapakoneta, Auglaize County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Robertson, Isaac D. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Acute diarrhoea [diarrhea]. Treatment: Astringents, tomes and stimulants. Result: Cured and returned to duty.

Acute diarrhoea [diarrhea]
